references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a crucial technique leveraged by the target paper for video generation.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with clip latents
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for high-quality image generation from text prompts that serves as a foundation for the target paper's video generation approach.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a significant advancement in high-resolution image synthesis using diffusion models, which is directly relevant to the target paper's focus on generating high-quality videos.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper extends diffusion models to videos, improving the quality and scalability of video generation, directly relevant to the target paper's video generation model.

references.paper_title: Cameractrl: Enabling camera control for text-to-video generation
references.reason: This paper introduces the CameraCtrl model that enables camera control for video generation, which is directly adopted and extended by the target paper's collaborative video diffusion model.
